recommended_degree: Biologi, Teknik Pangan, Fisika, Gizi, Agroteknologi (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
Assisting in product inspection and testing.
Supporting document control (SOPs, inspection reports).
Helping to collect and analyze quality data.
Assisting in calibration or verification of measuring tools.
Supporting QA team in audit preparation and improvement activities.
